# @urban-ui/popover

Popover for positioning overlay content relative to a trigger.

## Basic Example

```tsx
import { DialogTrigger, Popover } from '@urban-ui/popover'
import { Button } from '@urban-ui/button'
import { Dialog } from 'react-aria-components'

function Example() {
  return (
    <DialogTrigger>
      <Button>Open Popover</Button>
      <Popover placement="bottom" showArrow>
        <Dialog>
          <p>Popover content here</p>
        </Dialog>
      </Popover>
    </DialogTrigger>
  )
}
```

## Key Props

- `placement` - Position: `top`, `bottom`, `left`, `right`, `top start`, `bottom end`, etc.
- `offset` - Distance from trigger (default: 8)
- `showArrow` - Show arrow pointing to trigger (default: false)
